pros: Grippy on wet trails and steep descents; Bouncy and responsive; Natural-feeling ride; Pillowy landing; Dampens impact; Wide toe box; Secure lockdown; Drains fast; Breezy under warm conditions
cons: Way pricier than the Timp 3; Lacks stability on technical trails
RR_verdict: A do-everything shoe, the Timp 4 from Altra is positioned as the brand's trail runner that can go the distance. With its plush and comfort-oriented construction, it delivers a soft and forgiving ride on our easy days out on the trail. Whether you're running on light or moderately technical trails, we can highly recommend the Altra Timp 4.
awards: Top pick in best Altra trail running shoes (2023)
